alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Northeast Blue Mountains; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 4:18AM PST until February 03 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected with accumulations of two to three inches. * WHERE...Portions of North and North Central Idaho. portions of Southeast Washington. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Northeast Blue Mountains; Washington Palouse
